title: Reflective Tool-Based Microlearning for Science Domain Learning Object Design

context.prior_knowledge: Principles of Basic Learning Design and Work Experience in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: A course combining reflective thinking and project-based assessment to enhance workplace applicability for practicing professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can design goal-content-assessment systems for science learning objects using reflective tools.
Learners can improve learning object designs twice or more through peer feedback and self-assessment.
Learners can create three or more learning object prototypes in mobile environments and verify their feasibility.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
